job.title: Software Test Engineer
job.description: Our client has an urgent need for a software test engineer to join their team right away. This individual will be working in their consumer mobile application products group. This individual will be developing test tools for the SW Testers to utilize. They will be writing the automation code in Python and will be testing it and giving feedback to the team on how it performs. Actalent connects passion with purpose.
